pageContext.claim: “The VA was a disaster. All of my life, I've seen these horror stories. I don't want to -- I don't want to really jinx it because they'll go around and find somebody that's unhappy. But you don't see that anymore.”
pageContext.analysis: There continue to be reports of veterans being abused and facing long wait times for treatment. For instance, in 2019, there were news stories about 11 suspicious deaths at a VA Medical Center, a VA pathologist who misdiagnosed 3,000 cases and wasn't fired until 2018, a VA physician who allegedly sexually assaulted more than a dozen patients, and how a veteranat a VA facility was allegedly bitten by ants 100 times before his death.
